alert.note: Alert for Marion; Schley; Sumter; Webster (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 8:31PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Marion, east central Webster, southern Schley and Sumter Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 830 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Friendship, or 7 miles southwest of Ellaville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Americus, Ellaville, Plains, Leslie, Andersonville, De Soto, Desoto, Cobb, Sumter, Lamar, Croxton Crossroads, New Era, La Crosse, Huntington, Friendship, Maddox, and Bumphead. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for west central Georgia.
